steps.name: User has navigated to the login page of SmartEdu app "http://localhost:8080/"
User clicks on the login button
User should be able to see "Login failed!" notification message
User has navigated to the register page of SmartEdu app "http://localhost:8080/register"
User registers with username "daryl" and password "daryl"
User clicks on the register button
User should see notification message "Registrasi berhasil untuk daryl"
User has navigated to the register page of SmartEdu app "http://localhost:8080/register"
User enters existing username "admin" and password "1234"
User clicks on the register button
User should see notification message "Username sudah terdaftar"
